parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh-CN: Chinese
*   en-US (default): English

parameters.name: IpVersion
parameters.description:
The IP address type of health check nodes. Valid values:

*   IPv4: applicable when health checks are performed on IPv4 addresses.
*   IPv6: applicable when health checks are performed on IPv6 addresses.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the health check probe template, which is recommended to be distinguishable for configuration personnel to differentiate and remember, ideally indicating the health check protocol.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Current page number, starting from **1**, default is **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of rows per page when paginating queries, with a maximum value of 100 and a default of 20.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
Protocol types for initiating probes to the target IP address:
- ping
- tcp
- http
- https
